rows.label: qev087403_MSG0001
rows.name: He's got to be around here somewhere...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0002
rows.name: Elma-san, there he is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0003
rows.name: It's the Commander old man-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0004
rows.name: We found Commander Vandham.

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0005
rows.name: It looks like he's actually working this time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0006
rows.name: Maintenance can't keep up, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0007
rows.name: Ah, yeah, yesterday's battle was pretty intense.

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0008
rows.name: Let's prioritize the units with less damage first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0009
rows.name:
As for the heavily damaged Dolls, rather than fixin' 'em, strip 'em
for parts. It's faster that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0010
rows.name: Understood![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0011
rows.name:
We can reuse the electrical systems and generators, but
the secondary armor components are useless[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0012
rows.name: Ah, yeah. We'll need materials for that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0013
rows.name: Hey! You gawkers over there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0014
rows.name: What!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0015
rows.name:
"Gawkers"? That's harsh[ST:wide ]—
especially since you're the one who told us to come watch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0016
rows.name:
Ah, don't say that.
This'll end up helpin' out BLADE as a whole, y'know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0017
rows.name:
Right, if you understand, go gather
the necessary materials real quick for me[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0018
rows.name: You should just go do that yourself, old man-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0019
rows.name:
Me? I have to supervise
the mechanics here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0020
rows.name: Sorry. I'm countin' on ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087403_MSG0021
rows.name: Guess this is a mission too[ST:wide ]— Understood.[ST:wait ]
